mapper.select: /* project.selectProjectOwnerUser */ SELECT * FROM cm_console.CM_CORP CC INNER JOIN cm_console.CM_USER CU ON CC.CORP_ID = CU.CORP_ID INNER JOIN cm_bo.CM_USER_ROLE CUR ON CU.USER_ID = CUR.USER_ID WHERE CC.CORP_ID = #{corpId} AND CUR.ROLE_CD = 'OWNER'

/* project.selectCallbackManageApprovalBrandList */ SELECT CRB.BRAND_NAME , CRB.CORP_ID FROM cm.CM_RCS_BRAND CRB WHERE 1=1 AND CRB.CORP_ID = #{corpId} AND (CRB.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} OR CRB.PROJECT_ID = 'ALL') ORDER BY CRB.REG_DT DESC
